com.intuit.wasabi.authorization

Interface Authorization

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAuthorization

    public interface Authorization
    Repository for authorization-related data access methods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkSuperAdmin(UserInfo.Username userID)
      Verifies super admin permissions for the given user name (ID)
      void checkUserPermissions(UserInfo.Username userID, Application.Name applicationName, Permission permission)
      Verifies permission for the given user name (ID) within the application, throws AuthenticationException if not a valid permission
      void deleteUserRole(UserInfo.Username userID, Application.Name applicationName, UserInfo admin)
      Deletes a user role for the given user name (ID) within the given application name
      UserRoleList getApplicationUsers(Application.Name applicationName)
      Returns a list of users and their roles for the given application name
      List<Permission> getPermissionsFromRole(Role role)
      Returns a list of permissions for the given role
      UserInfo.Username getUser(String authHeader)
      Returns user name from the given auth header
      UserInfo getUserInfo(UserInfo.Username userID)
      Retrieves the full UserInfo for the given UserInfo.Username
      UserPermissions getUserPermissions(UserInfo.Username userID, Application.Name applicationName)
      Returns permissions for given user within the application
      UserPermissionsList getUserPermissionsList(UserInfo.Username userID)
      Returns a list of user permissions for the given user name (ID)
      UserRoleList getUserRoleList(UserInfo.Username userID)
      Returns list of user roles for the given user name (ID)
      Map setUserRole(UserRole userRole, UserInfo admin)
      Sets a role for the given user role object and returns status fields

    • Method Detail

      • getPermissionsFromRole

        List<Permission> getPermissionsFromRole(Role role)
        Returns a list of permissions for the given role
        Parameters:
        role - Given role
        Returns:
        List of Permission objects if found, empty list otherwise

      • getUserPermissionsList

        UserPermissionsList getUserPermissionsList(UserInfo.Username userID)
        Returns a list of user permissions for the given user name (ID)
        Parameters:
        userID - Username
        Returns:
        list of user permissions if found, empty list otherwise

      • getApplicationUsers

        UserRoleList getApplicationUsers(Application.Name applicationName)
        Returns a list of users and their roles for the given application name
        Parameters:
        applicationName - Application name
        Returns:
        list of users and their roles if found, empty list otherwise

      • getUserPermissions

        UserPermissions getUserPermissions(UserInfo.Username userID,
                                   Application.Name applicationName)
        Returns permissions for given user within the application
        Parameters:
        userID - User name (ID)
        applicationName - Application name
        Returns:
        list of user permissions if found, empty list otherwise

      • deleteUserRole

        void deleteUserRole(UserInfo.Username userID,
                    Application.Name applicationName,
                    UserInfo admin)
        Deletes a user role for the given user name (ID) within the given application name
        Parameters:
        userID - User name (ID)
        admin - the admin deleting the user role
        applicationName - Application name

      • checkUserPermissions

        void checkUserPermissions(UserInfo.Username userID,
                          Application.Name applicationName,
                          Permission permission)
        Verifies permission for the given user name (ID) within the application, throws AuthenticationException if not a valid permission
        Parameters:
        userID - User name (ID)
        applicationName - Application name
        permission - Permission
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - if not a valid permission

      • getUser

        UserInfo.Username getUser(String authHeader)
        Returns user name from the given auth header
        Parameters:
        authHeader - Authentication header
        Returns:
        user name if found
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - if the user name could not be extracted

      • setUserRole

        Map setUserRole(UserRole userRole,
                UserInfo admin)
        Sets a role for the given user role object and returns status fields
        Parameters:
        userRole - User role
        admin - the admin setting the user role
        Returns:
        map of status fields

      • getUserRoleList

        UserRoleList getUserRoleList(UserInfo.Username userID)
        Returns list of user roles for the given user name (ID)
        Parameters:
        userID - User name (ID)
        Returns:
        list of user roles for the given user name (ID), empty list otherwise

      • checkSuperAdmin

        void checkSuperAdmin(UserInfo.Username userID)
        Verifies super admin permissions for the given user name (ID)
        Parameters:
        userID - User name (ID)
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - if not a super admin

      • getUserInfo

        UserInfo getUserInfo(UserInfo.Username userID)
        Retrieves the full UserInfo for the given UserInfo.Username
        Parameters:
        userID - the username that is used for the lookup
        Returns:
        the complete UserInfo
